SELECT report_dt, coalesce(sum(success_cnt),0) as success_cnt, coalesce(sum(fail_cnt),0) as fail_cnt , 0 as open_cnt, 0 as duration_cnt, 0 as link_cnt, 0 as returnmail_cnt FROM ( SELECT substr(b.report_dt,1,6) as report_dt, b.success_cnt, b.fail_cnt FROM nvcampaign a, nvsmsrptsendresult b WHERE a.campaign_no = b.service_no
AND a.user_id = #{userVo.userId}
AND a.grp_cd LIKE concat(#{userVo.grpCd},'%')
AND b.service_type = 'em' AND b.report_dt LIKE concat(#{searchDate},'%') AND b.send_gbn IN (#{sendGbn1}, #{sendGbn2}) ) c GROUP BY report_dt ORDER BY report_dt

SELECT report_dt, coalesce(sum(success_cnt),0) as success_cnt, coalesce(sum(fail_cnt),0) as fail_cnt , 0 as open_cnt, 0 as duration_cnt, 0 as link_cnt, 0 as returnmail_cnt FROM ( SELECT substr(b.report_dt,1,8) as report_dt, b.success_cnt, b.fail_cnt FROM nvcampaign a, nvsmsrptsendresult b WHERE a.campaign_no = b.service_no AND b.service_type = 'em'
AND b.report_dt LIKE concat(#{searchDate},'%') AND b.send_gbn IN (#{sendGbn1}, #{sendGbn2}) ) c GROUP BY report_dt ORDER BY report_dt

SELECT 0 as result_seq, report_dt as start_dt, '000000' as start_tm, '00000000' as end_dt, '000000' as end_tm, '' resend_sts , coalesce(sum(send_cnt),0) as send_cnt, coalesce(sum(success_cnt),0) as success_cnt, 0 as returnmail_cnt , coalesce(sum(fail_cnt),0) as soft_bounce_cnt, 0 as hard_bounce_cnt, 0 as open_cnt, 0 as duration_cnt, 0 as link_cnt FROM nvsmsrptsendresult WHERE report_dt BETWEEN #{searchStartDt} AND #{searchEndDt} AND service_no = #{ecareNo} AND service_type = 'ec' GROUP BY report_dt ORDER BY report_dt DESC

SELECT a.result_seq, b.start_dt, b.start_tm, b.end_dt, b.end_tm, b.resend_sts , coalesce(a.send_cnt,0) send_cnt, coalesce(a.success_cnt,0) success_cnt, 0 as returnmail_cnt , coalesce(a.fail_cnt,0) as soft_bounce_cnt, 0 as hard_bounce_cnt, 0 as open_cnt, 0 as duration_cnt, 0 as link_cnt FROM nvsmsrptsendresult a, nvecaresendresult b WHERE a.service_no = b.ecare_no AND a.result_seq = b.result_seq AND a.service_no = #{ecareNo} AND a.service_type = 'ec' AND b.start_dt BETWEEN #{searchStartDt} AND #{searchEndDt} AND (b.resend_sts IS NULL OR b.resend_sts = 'F') ORDER BY b.start_dt DESC, a.result_seq DESC

SELECT report_dt, coalesce(sum(success_cnt),0) as success_cnt, coalesce(sum(fail_cnt),0) as fail_cnt , 0 as open_cnt, 0 as duration_cnt, 0 as link_cnt, 0 as returnmail_cnt FROM ( SELECT substr(report_dt,1,6) as report_dt, b.success_cnt, b.fail_cnt FROM nvecaremsg a, nvsmsrptsendresult b WHERE a.ecare_no = b.service_no AND b.service_type = 'ec'
AND b.send_gbn = 'sms'
AND b.send_gbn IN ('lms','mms')
) c GROUP BY report_dt ORDER BY report_dt

SELECT report_dt, coalesce(sum(success_cnt),0) as success_cnt, coalesce(sum(fail_cnt),0) as fail_cnt , 0 as open_cnt, 0 as duration_cnt, 0 as link_cnt, 0 as returnmail_cnt FROM ( SELECT b.report_dt, b.success_cnt, b.fail_cnt FROM nvecaremsg a, nvsmsrptsendresult b WHERE a.ecare_no = b.service_no AND b.service_type = 'ec'
AND b.send_gbn = 'sms'
AND b.send_gbn IN ('lms','mms')
) c GROUP BY report_dt ORDER BY report_dt

SELECT b.start_dt, b.start_tm, b.end_dt, b.end_tm, b.result_sts , coalesce(a.send_cnt,0) send_cnt, coalesce(a.success_cnt,0) success_cnt , 0 as hard_bounce_cnt, coalesce(a.fail_cnt,0) as soft_bounce_cnt FROM nvsmsrptsendresult a, nvecaresendresult b WHERE a.service_no = b.ecare_no AND a.result_seq = b.result_seq AND a.report_dt = #{ecareInfoVo.reportDt} AND a.service_no = #{ecareInfoVo.ecareNo} AND a.result_seq = #{ecareInfoVo.resultSeq} AND a.service_type = 'ec'

SELECT b.report_dt as start_dt, '000000' start_tm, '00000000' end_dt, '000000' end_tm, '' result_sts , coalesce(sum(b.send_cnt),0) as send_cnt, coalesce(sum(b.success_cnt),0) as success_cnt , 0 as hard_bounce_cnt, coalesce(sum(fail_cnt),0) as soft_bounce_cnt FROM nvecaremsg a, nvsmsrptsendresult b WHERE a.ecare_no = b.service_no AND b.report_dt = #{ecareInfoVo.reportDt} AND a.ecare_no = #{ecareInfoVo.ecareNo} AND b.service_type = 'ec' GROUP BY b.report_dt
